name: APP Control Voice Lite
description:
APPControl Voice Edition is an air traffic controller game with voice recognition. You guide the aircraft on your radar screen by talking to your iPad using real ATC clearances like:

- "American 13, Climb and maintain 4 thousand feet"
- "Iberia 56, Turn left heading 2 7 0"
- "Continental 78, speed 2 5 0 knots, proceed direct Bravo India Golf"
- "Delta 32, Cleared for approach runway 2 7 Left"

The app has a practice room to get used to the voice recognition and learn the specific clearances. A touch interface is available too.

As an air traffic controller you must maintain a lateral separation of 3 miles or a vertical separation of 1000 feet between aircraft landing and departing.

Give altitude, speed, heading and direct-to clearances to aircraft and make them reach the initial approach fix or the exit point at requested altitude.


This has many features of real air traffic control systems:
- moveable data blocks with different schemes
- speed vectors and past positions
- short term conflict alerts

The free online leaderboards system let you track your scores online and compare with other players.

This lite version is limited to two airports and 25 flights per game. Get the full version to play 200+ airports and unlimited games.
